The statement from Dan Hare: a spokesman for Birds Eye, confirming that only approximately 5% of the brand's vegetables come from China, primarily edamame.
The information from Green Giant: s website stating that their vegetables come from various locations in and outside of the U.S., but making no mention of China.
The statement from PictSweet: s Consumer Affairs Specialist confirming that most of their vegetables are grown in the USA, but some are grown south of the border, and all of their processing facilities are in the USA.
The expert: s overall verdict that the claim about vegetable sourcing from China is "Mostly False" based on the information gathered.
